text: :This is about the Korean athlete born in 1981. For the Japanese athlete born in 1974, see Pak Yong-Ho. Park Yong-Ho (born March 25, 1981) is a South Korean association football player. He was part of the South Korean team in 2004 Summer Olympics.SportsReference.com (SR), Park Yong-Ho, retrieved 2012-3-9. ==References== ==Other websites== * FIFA, Park Yong-Ho * NationalFootballTeams.com, Park Yong-Ho Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:South Korean footballers Category:Olympians for South Korea Category:People from Incheon
title: Park Yong-ho
